meanings.sent1: She pishes at the idea of eating broccoli.
meanings.sent2: He pishes whenever someone mentions his least favorite movie.
meanings.sent3: The cat pishes at the sight of the new dog in the house.
meanings.sent4: The toddler pishes at the thought of bedtime, refusing to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The student pishes loudly when the teacher assigns extra homework.

meanings.definition: A sound made by spitting or ejecting liquid forcefully from the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The pishes from the fountain created a soothing atmosphere in the garden.
meanings.sent2: He heard the pishes of the espresso machine as he entered the café.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's joke made the audience pish with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The raindrops made a gentle pish on the windowpane.
meanings.sent5: The chef's sauce had the perfect pish as it drizzled onto the dish.
